column2: Renounce HRE and proclaim German Empire
Our fathers destroyed Rome. Why should the victors bear the name of the vanquished?
Once upon a time, all Germans were free. Let us return to that age again, where only the strongest survived.
[From.GetTitledName] began a new era in history of the German people by laying foundation of the German Empire.
[From.GetTitledName] began a new era in history of the German people by abolishing the HRE and freeing every German man and woman.
